Title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy
Writer: Derek Drymon, Stephen Hillenburg (television series SpongeBob SquarePants), Tim Hill, Stephen Hillenburg, Kent Osborne, Aaron Springer, Paul Tibbitt, Stephen Hillenburg (story by)
Actors: Tom Kenny, Clancy Brown, Rodger Bumpass, Bill Fagerbakke
Plot: SpongeBob SquarePants takes leave from the town of Bikini Bottom in order to track down King Neptune's stolen crown.
Country: USA, Italy, Mexico, Australia, UK, Spain
Production: Nickelodeon Movies, Paramount Pictures International, United Plankton Pictures
